page.title: 10A Walk Through Dinas Village
page.content: { It is July 11th,1985.Let's go for a {walk through Dinas Village.} A lady{washing her car }with a bucket of water and cloth comes to our eyes while we walk through Dinas.A few yards away there is an old lady { {sweeping along the front of her {pavement.}Later on we can also see a man {sweeping the leaves from the {public pavements.}He has a brush in his hand and a trolley beside him which he pushes as he goes,picking up the rubbish.Vans come rushing by and one {reverses up, right to the end of {a little lane called "Spring Hill".}As we pass a little shop called "Kiel House"we see people{waiting by the {bus stop,getting on and off the bus.} As we pass we see{a man delivering {sausages to "Kiel House" from a large {van.}Beside the lorry,{a lady pushes {her baby in a pram. }
